I didn't know it was this important to defrag...

 http://i55.tinypic.com/s4rpzq.png 

it got WAYYY worst after i started defragging

I would recommend using Defraggler  instead, its a very nice program.

And yes, defragmenting is good. If I dont defragment after two weeks, I lose about 80 GB to fragmented files.
On bad days, its been up to 200 GB.

true.. it's better to do it weekly which takes waaay less time than doing it monthly. Everything stacks up on you in a month and it would take a long ass time to defrag a whole month's worth of files than a whole week's.
I'm defragging two years worth of stuff right now.
basically, about 1 week of not defragment, I already lost around 1 - 2 GB

Defragging now, posting updates also, should be good. 7 months of fragmented shit.

EDIT: that was a fast anaylisis

 http://k.minus.com/jbraj1XR6NGOrH.jpg 

Defregging now, gonna go watch Dexter 

Been about 15 minutes, 2% done.

SO: my computer updated mid way thru defragging. fucking windows update. i no hav 98.2 gigs. HELLLLLOOOOOOOO SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE

Before
 http://i56.tinypic.com/206iscz.png 

After
 http://i54.tinypic.com/2q0u3xy.png

I haven't defragmented in like, two days! Oh noes! 
Tisk tisk, I was expecting larger drives from you, Corey and Radio!

I KNOW, dad ordered the computer back in 08 :/ so i had no control, getting a new on at christmas time!

i also fucked around with virtual ram.. which is un-re-use-able.
so, i screwed myself out of 17 GIGs

>> I haven't defragmented in like, two days! Oh noes! 
Tisk tisk, I was expecting larger drives from you, Corey and Radio! 
It's a old WD Blue 320gb, I just partition alot.

So i updated smart defrag to V2.2, and this

 http://k.minus.com/jbuMxkdrVzatiE.jpg 

im thinking because of the windows update that decided to interupt it 80 PERCENT INTO THE DEFRAG.
defragging later when i go out.

I would have to say that  you all should totally use DEFRAGGLER  due to its awesome sauce. (and stability)
On a different note: Remember folks, defragmenting is good.
